name: Getting Better (Eldritch T)
description: This game is just a brief prologue before a larger story of self-discovery.  You play as Dani Lilac, a recovering addict struggling with their illness. In the wake of their parent's passing, they return to their hometown where their parents were active members of the community, loved by all. Unfortunately, the last time they visited home was also the when they had their last major bender. Walk through your town, visit your childhood home, and speak to the townspeople to collect mementos from your past.
